self.name: messages.getHistory
self.description: Gets back the conversation history with one interlocutor / within a chat
self.descriptionExcerpt: Gets back the conversation history with one interlocutor / within a chat

arguments.name: offsetId
arguments.description: Only return messages starting from the specified message ID

arguments.name: offsetDate
arguments.description: Only return messages sent before the specified date

arguments.name: addOffset
arguments.description: Number of list elements to be skipped, negative values are also accepted.

arguments.name: maxId
arguments.description: If a positive value was transferred, the method will return only messages with IDs less than max_id

arguments.name: minId
arguments.description: If a positive value was transferred, the method will return only messages with IDs more than min_id

throws.description: The temporary auth key must be binded to the permanent auth key to use these methods.
throws.name: AUTH_KEY_PERM_EMPTY

throws.description: The provided chat id is invalid
throws.name: CHAT_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID
